column1: Users can view a list of books without applying a date filter.
Users cannot filter books if the date range input is left empty.
Users cannot filter books if an invalid date range is entered.
Users successfully navigate to the second page of books list using the "Next" button.
Users successfully navigate to a specific page of books list using page number.
Users cannot navigate to the next page of books list if it is the last page.
Users cannot navigate to a previous page of books list if it is the first page.
Users see an empty list if there are no books available.
Users can filter books by specifying a date range and see the filtered books list.
